marks: LRC: [日本繪宮川長春圖] {Nihon-e Miyagawa Chōshun zu} (Jap
medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gofun on silk
text: A courtesan seated in a relaxed position on a gameboard is watching her young attendant cutting up what must be some medicant or perfume and placing it in a lacquered box.
title: Seated Courtesan and her Attendant
